Title: Reuse Toolkit
Description: The toolkit to empower your MVVM and cross-platform patterns
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The toolkit to empower your MVVM and cross-platform patterns
Reuse is a toolkit that makes easier for you to implement specific MVVM and cross-platform patterns that you reuse oftenly across Windows Phone and Windows Store apps. Built over the building blocks of MVVM Light and leveraging as much as possible Portable Class Libraries.
